sentence.Network_en: Cashiers receive and disburse money in establishments other than financial institutions.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了金融机构,出纳员也会在一些社会机构里收款付款.

sentence.Network_en: Receive and disburse money in establishments other than financial institutions.
sentence.Network_cn: 负责公司和相关财务机构的资金收付.

sentence.Network_en: On approval, we will disburse the fund to your designated bank account directly.
sentence.Network_cn: 一经批核, 贷款将于扣除手续费后直接存入您指定的银行账户.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... disband v. 解散（军队） disburse v. 支付，支出；分配 discard v. 丢弃.

each disburse shall be made after the discussion and agreement from the Executive Committee , and shall be made in effect with the signatures from both the President and the Vice-President Finance .每次经费开支，需由执委会讨论同意通过，主席及财务副主席两人签字生效。
红十字会有所有权和分配权 (disburse)，壹基金则会加以监督 (oversee)，尽量确保款项会被用在相关的用途上。 (Pic)

list.abs: depreciation account 折旧帐户disbursement account 支付帐discretionary account 委托帐户
审计英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... cash receipt 现金收入 104. cash disbursement 现金支出 105. bank statement 银行对账单 106.
电子商务专业自荐信范文 - 范文 ... digital signature 数字化签名 disbursement services 支付服务 disintermediation 非居间化.
1295 disbursement 支付1296 disbursement voucher 付款凭单1297 discharge 解除债务,清偿

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old French desbourser, from des- (expressing removal) + bourse 'purse'

entry.tran: (通常指从专用资金中)支付，支出
entry.def: To disburse an amount of money means to pay it out, usually from a fund which has been collected for a particular purpose.

example.ex: The aid will not be disbursed until next year...
example.tran: 援助款到明年才会下拨。

example.ex: The bank has disbursed over $350m for the project.
example.tran: 银行已经为这个项目支付了超过 3.5亿美元。

auth_sentence.content: The security concerns have made it difficult for the U.S. to disburse money.
auth_sentence.res_content: The security concerns have made it difficult for the U.S. to disburse money.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The security concerns have made it difficult for the U.S. to disburse money.

auth_sentence.content: We formed a committee that helped look at how you disburse the money.
auth_sentence.res_content: We formed a committee that helped look at how you disburse the money.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We formed a committee that helped look at how you disburse the money.

auth_sentence.content: The EU says it will not disburse rescue funds until after the referendum.
auth_sentence.res_content: The EU says it will not disburse rescue funds until after the referendum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The EU says it will not disburse rescue funds until after the referendum.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

sentences.en: In the 2000—2008 school year, $426.5 million was disbursed to 349085 students.
sentences.cn: 2000至2008学年，共有349085名学生获发津贴，总额达4.265亿元。
